content:
Privacy Policy for PingPongTech # At PingPongTech, accessible from https://blog.pingpongtech.us.kg, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by PingPongTech and how we use it.
GDPR Data Protection Rights # We would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following:
The right to access â€“ You have the right to request copies of your personal data. The right to rectification â€“ You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. The right to erasure â€“ You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions. Log Files # PingPongTech follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they visit websites.
Cookies and Web Beacons # Like any other website, PingPongTech uses ‘cookies’. These cookies are used to store information including visitors’ preferences, and the pages on the website that the visitor accessed or visited.
summary:
Privacy Policy for PingPongTech
#

GDPR Data Protection Rights
#

title: Privacy Policy

content:
Terms of Use # Welcome to PingPongTech!
These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of PingPongTech’s Website, located at https://blog.pingpongtech.us.kg.
By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use PingPongTech if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.
Cookies # We employ the use of cookies. By accessing PingPongTech, you agreed to use cookies in agreement with the PingPongTech’s Privacy Policy.
License # Unless otherwise stated, PingPongTech and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on PingPongTech. All intellectual property rights are reserved.
